attributes.action: Lower the age for cancer screening.
attributes.additional_details: It's simple, early screening can save lives !!!
attributes.background: Cancer has no age and nor should screening... screen younger, save earlier

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not exactly sure what you want the UK Government and Parliament to do.

There are many different types of cancer and different screening processes that are used to detect them.  We're also not sure what age you'd like people to be routinely screened for cancer. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want the age for mammograms (which are used to detect breast cancer) to be reduced, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200153 

If you want the age for routine cervical smear tests (which are used to detect cervical cancer) you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200368
